alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 10:56PM CDT until September 10 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR ARMSTRONG AND CARSON COUNTIES... At 1055 PM CDT, automated weather equipment reported severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Skellytown to 6 miles north of Wayside, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 1043 PM CDT, automated weather equipment recorded a 59 mph wind gust 4 miles west southwest of Pantex. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Panhandle, Claude, Washburn, Wayside, and Pantex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
